name: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: Black Book
name_original: Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: Black Book
description:
Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: Black Book is an adventure-RPG game. It was originally released in 2000. Atlus published the game. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
Shin Megami Tensei: Devil Children: Black Book is available on PlayStation and Game Boy Color.
